SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCOUNTRYID
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Retrieve the Country constituent id (same as country extension id) for the child specified
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCOUNTRYID ( @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID uniqueidentifier ) returns uniqueidentifier with execute as caller as begin declare @projectID uniqueidentifier declare @countryID uniqueidentifier
select @projectID = slocation.FIELDOFFICEID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation on so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID = slocation.ID where so.ID = @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID
set @countryID = dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_GETCOUNTRYID (@projectID)
return @countryID end
